thread.title: Police investigating after body found near high school - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Police investigating after body found near high school - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Police investigating after body found near high school - Massachusetts news
text:
WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) â€” A school official says a police liaison officer has found a body in an abandoned building next to a Massachusetts high school.
The Telegram & Gazette reports (http://bit.ly/1L2YUdY ) Worcester Technical High School officials say police were alerted but that a lockdown was unnecessary. The building where the body was found Thursday morning is located on city property next to a school parking lot.
 Police spokesman Sgt. Kerry F. Hazelhurst says the case is under investigation as an unattended death. The cause of death is unknown and an autopsy is being conducted.
___
Information from: Telegram & Gazette (Worcester, Mass.), http://www.telegram.com
